physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Fundic gland polyposis detected endoscopically; no adenomas/dysplasia or carcinomas found.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At age 46, biopsy from gastric body showed high-grade dysplasia, prompting proximal gastrectomy.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Two large lesions of high-grade dysplasia found in gastric body.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: High-grade dysplasia corresponding to Category 4 in the Vienna classification developed over time.
